title: En Kannukulla Oru Sirikki Lyrics Appuchi Graamam
stanzas:
En Kannukulla Oru Sirikki Song Lyrics AppuchiGraamam
#VishalC #Charukesh #VarunVishwa

en kannu kulla oru sirikki
kattipottalae enna irukki
manasa kattipoda maruthaale
haiyoh aiyayo (2)

En kadhula isai pola
pesura un koraallalae
yesapolave neeyum pesave
eppovume rasikira naane
yedho yedho paadurae naane

en kannu kulla oru sirikki
kattipottalae enna irukki
manasa kattipoda maruthaale
haiyoh aiyayo

kuthaalathu sarala pol nallaa
sirikka ye thenmozhi
kannangkuzhi pothaathunu
mayakkum un mai vizhi

karuva paya kanavellam
Color padam  aanathanaala
muzhichaalum medhanthalae
Kathalenum  palaaku mela

thadumaraum en manasu kekuthu
eppo unna servathu maane
pithanathan aaguren naane

en kannu kulla oru sirikki
kattipottalae enna irukki
manasa kattipoda maruthaale
haiyoh aiyayo

vetkathuke vekam varum
un maeni muzhu pournami
sokknukke aasa varum
enna azhagu ye kanmani

thai maasam thaethi kurikava
Thenam thenam  kelvi kekuthu
un nenjula uonjal aadave
manjakayur yenki vaaduthu

thadumaraum en manasu kekuthu
eppo unna servathu maane
pithanathan aaguren naane

en kannu kulla oru sirikki
kattipottalae enna irukki
manasa kattipoda maruthaale
haiyo haiyayo

thadumaraum en manasu kekuthu
eppo unna servathu maane
pithanathan aaguren naane
